contest-event.event-date: Feb. 1, 1998 D Durham League Contest (Section D) Durham League Contest (Section D) 40 Test Piece Contest Durham League Contest durham-league-contest-section-d The 2010 contest, due to take place on 5th December, was cancelled due to heavy snow. (4barsrest news article) First Suite in Eb Lubetkin Theatre, East Durham College, Peterlee Best cornet - S.King (Lanchester). 6 bands competed. April 30, 2015, 11:28 a.m. March 22, 2016, 10:12 a.m. 1 Lanchester Brass Graeme Tindall 2 Ovington Tynedale Band Stuart Gray 3 Stanhope Silver Steve Robson 4 Backworth Colliery Band Tony Griffiths 5 Marske Brass Alun Prest 6 Trimdon Concert Brass Brian Wright
